sub_title: Director Open Science NL, part of Dutch Research Council NWO
summary: Skilled research policy director with over 15 years of experience on institutional, national and international level. Sharp political administrative sensitivity. Practical, pragmatic, diplomatic. Communicative, networker, team player. Passionate about open science and open access. Scholarly communication. Science 2.0. Responsible research assessment. International collaboration. Historian of science by training.
